Name: First successful Mars mission by an Asian country
Asian First: First Martian mission by a country to succeed on the first attempt. Third country to do so after the USSR and the USA.

Name: First to successfully launch and deploy 104 satellites simultaneously from a single rocket (PSLV -C37).[80][81]
Asian First: First country in the world to launch more than 100 satellites at one go.

Asian First: First soft landing on the far side of the Moon by any country. Landed with Yutu-2 rover.
